projects.title: State Couplings for Binding Affinity
projects.summary: Equivariant message-passing architecture comparing apo vs. holo protein states (and ligand context) to predict binding affinity from learned state differences.
projects.detail:
Longer-form notes about the project can go here. This might include:
- What you're actually trying to show.
- Current bottlenecks or questions.
- A rough roadmap of next experiments.

You can keep this fairly free-form; it's just for you.

projects.title: Alanine Dipeptide CV Prototype
projects.summary: Minimal MD system to test whether a state-comparison network can recover a low-dimensional collective variable separating metastable basins.
projects.detail:
Use this project page to track which CVs you've tried, how you
evaluated them, and which diagnostics seemed most informative.

You can paste in quick bullet lists, rough ideas, or links you care about.

projects.title: Equivariant Pooling & Graph Coarsening
projects.summary: Exploring pooling-based graph coarsening layers that respect rotational symmetry while learning relevant length scales for protein–ligand systems.
projects.detail:
This is a good place to jot down toy examples, quick sketches of
pooling operators, or references you want to remember.

Idea: keep a short list of "experiments to run next" at the bottom.

projects.title: Enhanced Sampling via Learned CVs
projects.summary: Connect learned collective variables and committors to control / Schrödinger bridge ideas for targeted sampling on protein–ligand landscapes.
projects.detail:
Since this is still incubating, you can use this space mostly for
collected references and half-baked ideas.

When it graduates to an active project, update status to 'active'
and tighten the description/plan.
